title: Mini-Ep 154: Scalp Detox and Champagne Toasts
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 154: Scalp Detox and Champagne Toasts
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree discuss a fun scalp product, the South Korean show Crash Landing on You, and the American election results, and hear from listeners about celebrating holidays during pandemic times, eating in the shower, and quaint English villages. Plus...
description:
Kate and Doree discuss a fun scalp product, the South Korean show Crash Landing on You, and the American election results, and hear from listeners about celebrating holidays during pandemic times, eating in the shower, and quaint English villages. Plus listeners share relationship advice for people with partners who won’t commit.

 

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast). To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com. Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

  • BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.
  • ULTA BEAUTY - See the joy this holiday season! Shop in store, curbside pickup or online at ulta.com
  • CALM - For 40% off a Calm Premium subscription, head to calm.com/forever35.
  • GLOSSIER - For a limited time, new customers can get 10% off your first order at Glossier.com/podcast/FOREVER35. 
  • HELLO FRESH - Get $20 off your first four boxes when you go to hellofresh.com/forever80 and enter promo code FOREVER80.
  • Allure: The Science of Beauty Podcast - Listen to Allure: The Science of Beauty wherever you get your podcasts. New episodes every Thursday!


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
